summary: Comprehensive testing of VC Deal Intelligence System completed successfully. All backend APIs working (100% success rate), frontend navigation functional, dashboard charts rendering, company detail tabs operational with radar/bar charts, upload page accessible with dropzone, companies search working. Test company TechVault AI (score 73, TIER_2) verified across all components.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (200 OK)
Dashboard stats endpoint with all required fields
Companies list API returning 1 company (TechVault AI)
Company detail API with all sections (company, pitch_decks, founders, enrichments, score, competitors, memo)
Company score endpoint with all scoring fields
Company memo endpoint with 11 sections
Upload endpoint validation working
Deck status endpoint functional
404 handling for non-existent companies
Frontend dashboard loading with stats cards (1 Total, 0 Processing, 1 Completed, 0 Failed)
Navigation sidebar with Dashboard/Upload/Companies links
Upload page with functional dropzone (PDF/PPTX up to 25MB)
Companies page with search functionality
Company detail page navigation and loading
All 5 tabs functional (Overview, Enrichment, Scoring, Memo, Competitors)
Scoring tab with radar chart and bar chart visualizations
Investment thesis display with BUY recommendation
Company data verification (TechVault AI, score 73, TIER_2, Series-A, San Francisco)
Chart rendering (23 SVG elements found)
Tier distribution pie chart and recent scores bar chart on dashboard

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major features working, minor navigation flow tested)
